participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Supportive and nurturing, always eager to help others.
participant_1.background: I have dogs. I attend church every week. I'm a woman. I work as a school teacher.

participant_2.name: Luis
participant_2.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, loves sharing knowledge about languages and music.
participant_2.background: My favorite Spanish word is trabajo. I also study languages. My next language to study is French. I am a musician. One of the languages that I am currently studying is Spanish.
